subtitle: A Guide to Choosing Your Path When Interpretation Becomes Responsibility
core_question: What does this mean for how we live?

fork_options.label: Can see, afraid to speak
fork_options.description: People want me to tell them what things mean.

fork_options.label: Speaks but says nothing
fork_options.description: I narrate but don't prescribe—and it feels empty.

cycle.title: The Cycle
cycle.subtitle: Observe → Interpret → Narrate → Canonize → Shatter → Reobserve
